title: chc的一个问题[全部家产]
author: lxl1230321
txt_content:
问题描述:
  首先.我创了一个1的主菜单.
  然后.我在主菜单上写了个打开地皮菜单的指令(chc open dipi1)
 玩家用1菜单打开后-


表示open权限已给-

replies.author: jiand_jun~~~
replies.txt_content:
你得这样
mangaddp 组 chestcommands.command.open.配置文件名字.yml

/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.open.1.yml
/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.item.1.yml
里面那个1必须是你的菜单名字！
然后复制一下-.- 就可以了

replies.author: lxl1230321
replies.txt_content:
12557584841 发表于 2015-11-7 16:17
/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.open.1.yml
/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.item.1.yml
里面那个1必须 ...
额.木有用

lxl1230321 发表于 2015-11-7 16:30
是用1菜单打开dipi1菜单
/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.open.dipi1.yml
/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.item.dipi1.yml

replies.author: lxl1230321
replies.txt_content:
12557584841 发表于 2015-11-7 17:07
/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.open.dipi1.yml
/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.item.dipi1.yml
也试了.没有用.还是那样子

replies.author: 脑残羊
replies.txt_content:
您好
请您先检查一下玩家在哪个组
输入/list查看
然后输入/mangaddp <组名> chestcommands.command.open
然后输入/mangaddp <组名> chestcommands.command.open.菜单名.yml
就行了
求精

replies.author: lxl1230321
replies.txt_content:
a1297866417 发表于 2015-11-7 20:22
chestcommands.command.open 你这个添加没
加了啊.chestcommands.command.open.dipi.yml
